Description: Postcard; printed paper; black and white photograph showing flood time near pyramids in Cairo.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used but the stamp has been previously soaked off. Message reads: "Gresham House Sharia Suliman Pacha Cairo I'm thoroughly enjoying all this [indistinct word] unlike I thought. am trying to see all I can but it's a [indistinct] about the guides they [indistinct] one. I went to their market alone cheers M.B." The same individual sent EPH-ME 2997.
